body_html:
Hi @shirishr @pjh5
I've just encountered the same error. Our configurations are the same except I am using python2.7.
I was running
python caffe2/python/operator_test/relu_op_test.py
and the error occurred:

RuntimeError: [enforce fail at context_gpu.h:155] . Encountered CUDA error: no kernel image is available for execution on the device Error from operator:
input: "X" output: "Y" name: "" type: "Relu" device_option { device_type: 1 } engine: ""

body:
Hi @shirishr @pjh5 
I've just encountered the same error. Our configurations are the same except I am using python2.7. 
I was running
`python caffe2/python/operator_test/relu_op_test.py`
and the error occurred:

RuntimeError: [enforce fail at context_gpu.h:155] . Encountered CUDA error: no kernel image is available for execution on the device Error from operator:
input: "X" output: "Y" name: "" type: "Relu" device_option { device_type: 1 } engine: ""
